subject: sir, you can only use our B
body: sir, you can only use our Bitcoin Wallet to send it if you want your fund

subject: Re:    sir, you can only use our B
body:
Dear Sir,

Thank you for your response. However, I would like to clarify that I am not comfortable using Bitcoin Wallet for transactions due to personal reasons. Is there any other method of payment that we could use? 

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards,
Lewis D.

Best wishes,
Anthony
